greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Simple periodic sequence: repeat 1,2,3,4.
comment: Partial sums are given by A130482(n)+n+1. - _Hieronymus Fischer_, Jun 08 2007
Terms of the simple continued fraction of 5/(2*sqrt(39)-9). - _Paolo P. Lava_, Feb 16 2009
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,1).
formula: a(n) = (7*(n mod 4)+(n+1 mod 4)+(n+2 mod 4)+(n+3 mod 4))/6 (cf. forms of modular arithmetic of Paolo P. Lava, i.e. see A146094). - _Bruno Berselli_, Sep 27 2010
xref: Cf. A177037 (decimal expansion of (9+2*sqrt(39))/15). - _Klaus Brockhaus_, May 01 2010
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
